attributes.action: Hold a referendum and let the electorate decide on Britains future within the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the transfer of soverignty and power to an unelected bureaucracy is membership of the EU still in Britains interest and does the taxpayer get value for money from membership ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
